lines.text: May the force be with you!
If this is foreplay I'm a dead man!
Every 10 or 11,000 years I make a horrible mistake.

[to Alma]
They say if we go with them, we'll live forever. And that's good. It's probably going to take you an eternity to forgive me... Alma, I'm sorry. I guess I was being ridiculous. I'm sorry. I love you. You're my whole life. I wanna go. But if it's a choice of only six more months here with you or living forever all by myself, well I'll take the six more months here with you. I don't want to live forever if you're not going to be with me.
So you think it's like Bernie said? We're cheating nature?
Yes.
Well I'll tell ya, with the way nature's been cheating us, I don't mind cheating her a little.
I wouldn't accuse you of dishonesty! I accuse you of being from another planet, but an honest planet!
Well I for one don't believe any of this alien crap.
You mean you don't believe your husband?
No, I don't believe him.
Well I believe him and I'm scared.
Well I don't believe him and I'm still scared!
I'm a citizen. I believe in this country. In 1945, Dutch Scholtz walked into my store and he said...
Bernie, if you don't wanna do this for Rose and you don't wanna do this for yourself that's fine, that's your business, but if you screw this up for the rest of us...
Don't threaten me, Joe, I don't need any of your threats. We're not doing it and that's final!
[Walks away]
Anyone having second thoughts?
I'm a citizen too. I was in the navy. I don't see anything wrong with it.
Then you drive. I got no license.
Men should be explorers, no matter how old they are. I don't know about anybody else, but I'm going.

[Stepping into the freezing cold pool]
Whoa, that'll make your ol' ball sack shrivel up.
You think there's cocaine in that pool?
Might be.
What if we O.D.?
We'll keep an eye on each other. I'll watch him
[pointing to Joe]
, you watch him
[pointing to Art]
, you watch me.
Perfect.

I want you all to consider what I am about to suggest to you. You people seem to want what we've got. Well, we have room for you. We have room for you and about 30 of your friends. You would be students of course, but you'd also be teachers. And the new civilizations you would be travelling to would be unlike anything you've ever seen before. But I promise you, you will all lead productive lives.
Forever?
We don't know what forever is.
I hope you're not gonna to take your skin off! 'Cause I really like skin on a woman!

[after leaping off his boat and swimming away from the Antereans, then stopping to review his situation]
I'm in the water... far from shore. It's at night... and they have my boat.... Shit.
Face-eating, Jack? Is that some kind of a delicacy?

[singing]
Oh I'm in the mood for love.
Will you listen to this guy, he'll be chasing them dolls 'til his dick runs off.
Oh I'm too old for that sort of thing.
Age isn't everything.
Nope.
Anyway it's all up here.
Not all up there, Pal. Some of it's down here, which I might add is stiff as a board.
You too? You got a boner too?
Blue steel. Cat couldn't scratch it.
I thought I was the only one.

[singing]
We're in the mood for love, simply because we've got one.
Bernie, why don't you stop being like that. We're doing this for Joe.
Joe? Is Joe above the law?
Yeah.
You guys wanna go out to dinner?
Yeah.
No Italian food! Makes me fart!
I feel great.
You wouldn't bullshit me?
My God, I'm telling the truth!
Why shouldn't he feel good? I feel tremendous! I'm ready to take on the world!

[getting in the shower with Mary]
Want a piece of candy, little girl?

[has just discovered the aliens and is trying to escape by trying to start his boat]
I've had all kinds of people on this boat. All races, all nationalities, all creeds. Oh my God, I can't believe it won't start!

[about Bess]
Gonna do anything about that one?
'Already have.
Put it to her?
You're disgusting.
So then you haven't, huh?
What?
I said, "so then you haven't."
So you went to the doctor, what did he say?
Oh it's a breeze. Everything is fine.
Hey wait a minute. This is ME you're talking to. Now you went to the Goddamn doctor. What did he say?

[after a pause]
Doctor's don't know everything.
Well there is the one school of thought that says they don't know nothing.
Look, I don't want to get rough with you, pal, but I'm not taking half the money.
Alright then, give it back.
Hey, what are you... Just... Get your ass of my boat, Man. Get your ass off my boat. Do you believe this? And, take your embarrassing beach towel with you.
Ain't a son of a bitch in the world has to know we're in that pool. We'd just be a few old farts paddlin' around in that pool. Who's gonna know?

[after witnessing the indoor swimming pool being purchased]
Club house is closed, Gentlemen.
Maybe they could give us permission to use the pool. We could pay them something.
It wouldn't be fun if we had permission.
Put down that cocoon!
